nodes.name: isValidSignature
SignatureValidator

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,bytes memory) view external returns (bytes4)

nodes.name: isValidSignature

devdoc.details: Contains logic for signature validation. Signatures from wallet contracts assume ERC-1271 support (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1271.md) Notes: Methods are strongly inspired by contracts in https://github.com/0xProject/0x-monorepo/blob/development/

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params._data: Full EIP-712 data structure that was hashed and signed
params._hash: Hash of the EIP-712 encoded data
params._sig: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.     For non wallet signatures, _sig is expected to be an array tightly encoded as     (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType)
params._signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.
